content: Ummm…. never thought about that. Let’s see… quite to the contrary I’d think. Being in love — with love helps. Love has so many facets that being focused only on a break up would perhaps limit one to express sadness — hurt — pain — grief — without expressing the joyful moments — the tenderness — the delicate memorabilia of love. So I’d say it takes constantly being in a deep emotional state to be able to write these. Thank you for the question Kritika. And thank you for reading too. :)
